# StreamExtensions.AsStringAsync method

Returns stream input as string asynchronously.

```csharp
public static Task<string> AsStringAsync(this Stream stream, Encoding encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| stream | Stream to convert. |
| encoding | Stream to convert. |

## Return Value

String that represent the input stream.
